Class PreferencesView

java.lang.Object
org.supsi.view.preferences.PreferencesView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IView<ITranslationsModel>
public class PreferencesView extends Object implements IView<ITranslationsModel>
Represents the Preferences View in the application. This view allows users to update language preferences and toggle various debug and logging options. It interacts with the ITranslationsModel for translations and the IPreferencesModel for preference management.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes the preferences view. Sets up event handlers for buttons and loads the current preferences.

      Sets the translations model for the view.

    • build

      public void build()
      Builds or updates the preferences view based on the current model data. Populates the language choice box with supported languages.
      Specified by:
      build in interface IView<ITranslationsModel>

    • notifyPreferenceChange

      private void notifyPreferenceChange(String tag, javafx.scene.control.CheckBox box)
      Publishes a preference change event for the specified preference and checkbox state.
      Parameters:
      tag - the preference key
      box - the checkbox controlling the preference
